channel.title: CVE Feed for invernyx -- smartcars-3-bugs

item.title: CVE-2023-28441|2024-08-02T12:38:25.346Z -- invernyx -- smartcars-3-bugs
item.description: smartCARS 3 is flight tracking software. In version 0.5.8 and prior, all persons who have failed login attempts will have their password stored in error logs. This problem doesn't occur in version 0.5.9. As a workaround, delete the affected log file, and ensure one logs in correctly.
